data.actual_result: We stay on the "server panel" of the member and we can transfer ownership/ban again/kick again.
data.expected_result: When we ban/kick the client, we auto-leave the "pannel server" of the member.
data.short_description: [Android 6.x or under only] Kick or ban someone don't leave the server panel.
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to: Server settings> Member > Choose a member. - Scroll down until you see button for ban and kick. - Try ban or kick the client.
